Sentencas: A cogeneration system based on a methane-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) integrated with a Stirling engine is analyzed from the viewpoints of energy and exergy.
Titulo: Exergy assessment and optimization of a cogeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell integrated with a Stirling engine

Sentencas: The effects on the system performance are investigated of varying four key system parameters: current density, SOFC inlet temperature, compression ratio and regenerator effectiveness.
Titulo: Exergy assessment and optimization of a cogeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell integrated with a Stirling engine

Sentencas: The energy efficiency of the combined system is found to be 76.32% which is about 24.61% more than that of a stand-alone SOFC plant under the same conditions.
Titulo: Exergy assessment and optimization of a cogeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell integrated with a Stirling engine

Sentencas: Considering exergy efficiency as the only objective function, it is found that, as the SOFC inlet temperature increases, the exergy efficiency of the cogeneration system rises to an optimal value of 56.44% and then decreases.
Titulo: Exergy assessment and optimization of a cogeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell integrated with a Stirling engine

Sentencas: The second law analysis also shows that the air heat exchanger has the greatest exergy destruction rate of all system components.
Titulo: Exergy assessment and optimization of a cogeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell integrated with a Stirling engine

Sentencas: The cooling water of the engine also can supply the heating needs for a small home.
Titulo: Exergy assessment and optimization of a cogeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell integrated with a Stirling engine
Exergy assessment and optimization of a cogeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell integrated with a Stirling engine
